page.title: 18Comprehensives in the Forest
page.content:
{In September of this year all schools {are going in this area are going {comprehensive. This means that the {children here will not have to sit an {exam to see which secondary school {they will go to. A lot of schools are getting new names. The Grammar school in Coleford will be called Lakers. Double View Secondary will be called the Heyward school. The new headmaster will be called Mr East, he is very nice and very strict. The school is named after the tree plantation behind it. We will be the first people to go to the Heywood School. Everywhere there are going to be schools changing. We will have to wear a bottle green uniform.
{By Johanne Wozencroft.
